description:
A mysterious woman visits the ballpark, Ruriko tries to max her following, and a meal vendor laments her fate.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: The Definition of a Baseball Fan / No! Never! / The Head Scarf of Innocence
Yakyuu Fan Taru Mono / Dame! Zettai! / Junjou Sankakukin
野球ファンたるもの / ダメ! ゼッタイ! / 純情三角巾
